import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { IpcService } from '../ipc.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-forgot-password', templateUrl: './forgot-password.component.html', styleUrls: ['./forgot-password.component.css'] }) export class ForgotPasswordComponent { formData:any = {}; emailid:any Otp:any constructor(private ipcserv:IpcService,private route:Router){ } onSubmit(){ this.emailid=this.formData.emailid; this.SendAndGetOtp(this.emailid) } SendAndGetOtp(val:any){ return this.ipcserv.SendNGetOtp(val).subscribe((Otp:any) => { this.ipcserv.setOtp(Otp) this.route.navigateByUrl("/Otp") }); } } Sign In
